oxenfree oxenfree this game has raised me i think it the best video game of all time it has spooky ghosts with just the right amount of classic teenage angst in an 80s horror movie style fictional ww2 facts to obsess over check a radio to hear ghostly frequencies check a new stepbrother that you hang with for most of the night check so basically the perfect game   dont come to edwards island its not safe
